nodes.text: The Battle of Nuswatta was fought at the planet Nuswatta in the Pre-Republic era, during the Cronese Sweeps, a campaign between Xer's Kingdom of Cron and rebellious Cronese worlds.

Following the defeat of King Ferece at Chandaar, Xer installed himself as the new King of Cron and launched a campaign to take complete control of the Kingdom of Cron. The most-feared warlord involved in the Cronese Sweeps was not Xer but his teenage son, Xim. Xim became famous for his brutality during his conquests of Pasmin, Eibon and Nuswatta. Xim's legions razed the High Fane of Xo on Nuswatta, converting the theocracy to Xer's service via the business end of a beam-tube.
